title: Analysis of Emotional Impacts in Badminton Game Formats in Physical Education

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Strengthening emotional response analysis and design capabilities through case studies of mathematics-integrated physical education

learning_goals: Learners can explain three or more emotional triggers based on badminton game formats.
Learners can design emotion analysis surveys using the Critical Incident Technique (CIT).
Learners can develop lesson plans applying a predictive model of learner emotional responses in physical education design.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
